PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-11382012-09-27,  VAC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Forces Members and Veterans Re-establishment and Compensation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Forces Members and Veterans Re-establishment and Compensation Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN FORCES MEMBERS AND VETERANS RE-ESTABLISHMENT AND COMPENSATION REGULATIONS in order to allow Veterans Affairs Canada (VAC) to cease offsetting the VAC Pension Act disability pension in the calculation of earnings loss and Canadian forces income support benefits.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0195 Publication Date: 2012-10-10
AttachmentsAttachment
